_comment: ServiceNow Incident Creation Template - Customize placeholders before use

_placeholder_mappings.alert_name: Name of the alert (e.g., 'High CPU Usage')
_placeholder_mappings.alert_description: Detailed description of the alert condition
_placeholder_mappings.severity: P0, P1, P2, P3 or critical, high, warning, low
_placeholder_mappings.assignment_group: ServiceNow assignment group name or sys_id
_placeholder_mappings.ci_sys_id_or_name: CMDB Configuration Item sys_id or name
_placeholder_mappings.alert_id: Unique alert identifier from source system
